name: Whack-A-Demon!
description:
Are you bored of hitting moles with a hammer?
Then guess what - this is the game for you!

You play as the devil and some of your demons seem to misbehave..

Hunt them down with your giant business card and show them who the boss is!

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
LMB/Space/Q - Attack

This is my first game and i did all of the pixelart + programming using Asepirte and Godot. The music was made by a friend of mine!
